title: Eye of the octopus
creator_credit: James Siers, Judy Siers and Sierpinski Films
brief_description: Based on the true story of a 13 year old New Zealand boy who lives for a summer with the people of Kiribati, a remote Pacific island and learns their customs. He learns fishing, snorkelling, sailing, and survival techniques. Finally he must capture and kill an octopus in the customary manner.
creator_credit_for_label: James Siers, Judy Siers and Sierpinski Films
